title: Mobile Microlearning Course on Surface Anatomy of the Brain

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Biology and Medical Terminology
context.additional_context: A program for novice professional learners in managerial/leadership roles to acquire brain anatomy knowledge applicable to their work, operated with a summative assessment focus in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify 15 or more major structures of a 3D brain model with 80% accuracy
Learners can compare and explain functional characteristics by brain lobes
Learners can reproduce brain structures with 70% accuracy using five key visual angles, even in low spatial cognition scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
